text.name: gui_cc_job_time_text
text.text: Erledigt die Arbeit innerhalb von %s Stunden

text.name: dialog_cc_cannot_be_performed
text.text: Contract signing cancelled, contract proposal was no longer valid!

text.name: dialog_cc_already_active
text.text: Contract signing cancelled, looks like another one has already been signed!

text.name: dialog_cc_signing_confirm_title
text.text: Are you sure you want to accept this contract?

text.name: dialog_cc_signing_confirm_text
text.text: You'll have to pay %s now and an additional %s when the work is done.

text.name: dialog_cc_cancel_confirm_title
text.text: Are you sure you want to cancel this contract?

text.name: dialog_cc_cancel_confirm_text
text.text: You'll not be refunded of the Initiale Kosten.

text.name: warning_cc_noFarmlands
text.text: There's nothing for you here, buy some land first!

text.name: warning_cc_noFarm
text.text: There's nothing for you here, join a farm first!

text.name: dialog_cc_contract_cancelled_by_contractor
text.text: The contractor %s had an unexpected issue and therefore will not be able to fulfill the signed contract. He apologized and refunded you twice the amount of the deposit you paid.

text.name: dialog_cc_contract_prerequisites_no_longer_met
text.text: Something may have changed since the contract sign and the contractor %s can no longer perform the job.
